params.name: code
params.description: the invite code (unique ID)

params.name: guild
params.description: the guild this invite is for

params.name: channel
params.description: the channel this invite is for

params.name: inviter
params.description: the user who created the invite

params.name: target_type
params.description: the [type of target](#DOCS_RESOURCES_INVITE/invite-object-invite-target-types) for this voice channel invite

params.name: target_user
params.description: the user whose stream to display for this voice channel stream invite

params.name: target_application
params.description: the embedded application to open for this voice channel embedded application invite

params.name: approximate_presence_count
params.description: approximate count of online members, returned from the `GET /invites/<code>` endpoint when `with_counts` is `true`

params.name: approximate_member_count
params.description: approximate count of total members, returned from the `GET /invites/<code>` endpoint when `with_counts` is `true`

params.name: expires_at
params.description: the expiration date of this invite, returned from the `GET /invites/<code>` endpoint when `with_expiration` is `true`

params.name: stage_instance
params.description: stage instance data if there is a [public Stage instance](#DOCS_RESOURCES_STAGE_INSTANCE) in the Stage channel this invite is for

params.name: guild_scheduled_event
params.description: guild scheduled event data, only included if `guild_scheduled_event_id` contains a valid guild scheduled event id

params.name: uses
params.description: number of times this invite has been used

params.name: max_uses
params.description: max number of times this invite can be used

params.name: max_age
params.description: duration (in seconds) after which the invite expires

params.name: temporary
params.description: whether this invite only grants temporary membership

params.name: created_at
params.description: when this invite was created

params.name: members
params.description: the members speaking in the Stage

params.name: participant_count
params.description: the number of users in the Stage

params.name: speaker_count
params.description: the number of users speaking in the Stage

params.name: topic
params.description: the topic of the Stage instance (1-120 characters)
